tika-s0403t40:2_0: 75-82. Aṭṭhamassa paṭhamaṁ dutiyañca uttānatthameva. Tatiye vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito
tika-s0403t40:2_1: lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti. Alajjī (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.45) hi bahussutopi
tika-s0403t40:2_2: samāno lābhagarukatāya tantiṁ visaṁvādetvā uddhammaṁ ubbinayaṁ satthusāsanaṁ dīpetvā
tika-s0403t40:2_3: sāsane mahantaṁ upaddavaṁ karoti, saṅghabhedampi saṅgharājimpi uppādeti. Lajjī pana
tika-s0403t40:2_4: kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṁ avisaṁvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva ca
tika-s0403t40:2_5: dīpeti, satthusāsanaṁ garuṁ katvā ṭhapeti. Evaṁ yo lajjī, so vinayaṁ ajahanto avokkamantova
tika-s0403t40:3_0: Asaṁhīroti ettha saṁhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṁ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vā heṭṭhā vā uparito vā
tika-s0403t40:3_1: padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno vitthunati vipphandati, saṇṭhātuṁ na sakkoti, yaṁ
tika-s0403t40:3_2: yaṁ parena vuccati, taṁ taṁ anujānāti, sakavādaṁ chaḍḍetvā paravādaṁ gaṇhāti. Yo
tika-s0403t40:3_3: pana pāḷiyaṁ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vā heṭṭhupariyavasena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno
tika-s0403t40:3_4: na vitthunati na vipphandati, ekekalomaṁ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya ‘‘evaṁ mayaṁ vadāma,
tika-s0403t40:3_5: evaṁ no ācariyā vadantī’’ti vissajjeti. Yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane
tika-s0403t40:3_6: pakkhittasīhavasā viya parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ agacchanto tiṭṭhati, ayaṁ vuccati
tika-s0403t40:3_7: asaṁhīro. Yasmā pana evarūpo yaṁ yaṁ parena vuccati, taṁ taṁ nānujānāti, attanā suvinicchinitaṁ
tika-s0403t40:3_8: katvā gahitaṁ aviparītamatthaṁ na vissajjeti, tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘na sakkoti gahitaggahaṇaṁ
tika-s0403t40:6_0: 83. Navame vivekaṭṭhoti vivitto. Tenāha ‘‘dūrībhūto’’ti. Satiavippavāse ṭhitoti kammaṭṭhāne
tika-s0403t40:6_1: satiṁ avijahitvā ṭhito. Pesitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya nibbānaṁ pesitacitto
tika-s0403t40:9_0: 84. Dasame adhikarīyanti etthāti adhikaraṇāni. Ke adhikarīyanti? Samathā. Kathaṁ
tika-s0403t40:9_1: adhikarīyanti? Samanavasena. Tasmā te tesaṁ samanavasena pavattantīti āha ‘‘adhikaraṇāni
tika-s0403t40:9_2: samentī’’tiādi. Uppannānaṁ uppanānanti uṭṭhitānaṁ uṭṭhitānaṁ. Samathatthanti samanatthaṁ.
tika-s0403t40:9_3: Dīghanikāye saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyampi (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.331) vitthāratoyevāti etthāyaṁ
tika-s0403t40:9_4: vitthāranayo – adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṁ
tika-s0403t40:9_5: bhikkhūnaṁ yo vivādo, idaṁ vivādādhikaraṇaṁ nāma. Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā
tika-s0403t40:9_6: vā anuvadantānaṁ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca, idaṁ anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ nāma.
tika-s0403t40:9_7: Mātikāyaṁ āgatā pañca, vibhaṅge dveti sattapi āpattikkhandhā, idaṁ āpattādhikaraṇaṁ
tika-s0403t40:9_8: nāma. Yaṁ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṁ catunnaṁ kammānaṁ karaṇaṁ, idaṁ kiccādhikaraṇaṁ nāma.
tika-s0403t40:10_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya
tika-s0403t40:10_1: ca. Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṁ yasmiṁ vihāre uppannaṁ tasmiṁyeva vā, aññatra vūpasametuṁ
tika-s0403t40:10_2: gacchantānaṁ antarāmagge vā, yattha gantvā saṅghassa niyyātitaṁ, tattha saṅghena
tika-s0403t40:10_3: vā, saṅghe vūpasametuṁ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṁ
tika-s0403t40:10_4: sammati. Evaṁ sammamāne ca panetasmiṁ yā saṅghasammukhato dhammasammukhato vinayasammukhatā
tika-s0403t40:10_5: puggalasammukhatā, ayaṁ sammukhāvinayo nāma. Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena
tika-s0403t40:10_6: sammukhibhāvo saṅghasammukhatā. Sametabbassa vatthuno bhūtattā dhammasammukhatā.
tika-s0403t40:10_7: Yathā taṁ sametabbaṁ, tathevassa samanaṁ vinayasammukhatā. Yo ca vivadati, yena ca
tika-s0403t40:10_8: vivadati, tesaṁ ubhinnaṁ atthapaccatthikānaṁ sammukhībhāvo puggalasammukhatā. Ubbāhikāya
tika-s0403t40:10_9: vūpasame panettha saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati. Evaṁ tāva sammukhāvinayeneva sammati.
tika-s0403t40:11_0: Sace panevampi na sammati, atha naṁ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū ‘‘na mayaṁ sakkoma
tika-s0403t40:11_1: vūpasametu’’nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti. Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṁ bhikkhuṁ
tika-s0403t40:11_2: salākaggāhāpakaṁ sammannati, tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhakesu
tika-s0403t40:11_3: aññataravasena salākaṁ gāhāpetvā sannipatitāya parisāya dhammavādīnaṁ yebhuyyatāya
tika-s0403t40:11_4: yathā te dhammavādino vadanti, evaṁ vūpasantaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya
tika-s0403t40:11_5: ca vūpasantaṁ hoti. Tattha sammukhāvinayo vuttanayo eva. Yaṁ pana yebhuyyasikākammassa
tika-s0403t40:11_6: karaṇaṁ, ayaṁ yebhuyyasikā nāma. Evaṁ vivādādhikaraṇaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati.
tika-s0403t40:12_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena
tika-s0403t40:12_1: ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṁ yo ca anuvadati, yañca anuvadati,
tika-s0403t40:12_2: tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā, sace atthi ayaṁ nāmettha
tika-s0403t40:12_3: āpattīti evaṁ vinicchitaṁ vūpasammati. Tattha sammukhāvinayalakkhaṇaṁ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0403t40:13_0: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsitassa sativinayaṁ
tika-s0403t40:13_1: yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṁ deti, tadā sammukhāvinayena
tika-s0403t40:13_2: ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṁ hoti. Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṁ puggale kassaci
tika-s0403t40:13_3: anuvādo na ruhati. Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre
tika-s0403t40:13_4: ‘‘saratāyasmā evarūpiṁ āpatti’’nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno ‘‘ummattakena me, āvuso,
tika-s0403t40:13_5: etaṁ kataṁ, nāhaṁ taṁ sarāmī’’ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya
tika-s0403t40:13_6: amūḷhavinayaṁ yācati, saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṁ deti. Tadā
tika-s0403t40:13_7: sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṁ hoti. Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna
tika-s0403t40:13_8: tasmiṁ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati. Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena
tika-s0403t40:13_9: vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṁ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa puggalassa ‘‘sacāyaṁ
tika-s0403t40:13_10: acchinnamūlo bhavissati, sammā vattitvā osāraṇaṁ labhissati. Sace chinnamūlo, ayamevassa
tika-s0403t40:13_11: nāsanā bhavissatī’’ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṁ karoti,
tika-s0403t40:13_12: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṁ hotīti. Evaṁ anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ
tika-s0403t40:14_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca
tika-s0403t40:14_1: tiṇavatthārakena ca. Tassa sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasamo natthi. Yadā pana ekassa vā
tika-s0403t40:14_2: bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṁ āpattiṁ deseti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ
tika-s0403t40:14_3: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati. Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva
tika-s0403t40:14_4: yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti, tesaṁ sammukhībhāvo puggalasammukhato. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0403t40:15_0: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhato parihāyati. Yaṁ panettha ‘‘ahaṁ,
tika-s0403t40:15_1: bhante, itthannāmaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno’’ti ca ‘‘passasī’’ti ca ‘‘āma, passāmī’’ti ca
tika-s0403t40:15_2: paṭiññātāya ‘‘āyatiṁ saṁvareyyāsī’’ti karaṇaṁ, taṁ paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ nāma. Saṅghādisese
tika-s0403t40:15_3: parivāsādiyācanā paṭiññā, parivāsādīnaṁ dānaṁ paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ nāma.
tika-s0403t40:16_0: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhācāraṁ caritvā puna
tika-s0403t40:16_1: lajjidhamme uppanne ‘‘sace mayaṁ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṁ kāressāma, siyāpi taṁ
tika-s0403t40:16_2: adhikaraṇaṁ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya saṁvatteyyā’’ti aññamaññaṁ āpattiyā kārāpane
tika-s0403t40:16_3: dosaṁ disvā yadā bhikkhū tiṇavatthārakakammaṁ karonti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena
tika-s0403t40:16_4: ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati. Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā ‘‘na metaṁ khamatī’’ti
tika-s0403t40:16_5: evaṁ diṭṭhāvikammaṁ akatvā ‘‘dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamma’’nti na ukkoṭenti,
tika-s0403t40:16_6: niddampi okkantā honti, sabbesaṁ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṁyuttañca sabbāpattiyo
tika-s0403t40:16_7: vuṭṭhahanti. Evaṁ āpattādhikaraṇaṁ tīhi samathehi sammati.
tika-s0403t40:17_0: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ ekena samathena sammati sammukhāvinayeneva. Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni
tika-s0403t40:17_1: yathānurūpaṁ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti. Tena vuttaṁ – ‘‘uppannuppannānaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ
tika-s0403t40:17_2: samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārako’’ti. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānameva.
